articles.title: Roku has patented a way to show ads over anything you plug into your TV - Ars Technica
articles.description: System would detect paused content on external devices and show ads on top.
articles.content:

179
Roku TV sets come with ads. Generally, these are restricted to Roku's home and menu screens, its screensavers, and its first-party video channels, an… [+3614 chars]
